topic: Association of Public and Land-grant Universities

question: Is there a correlation between the number of staff and the year the association was founded?
sql: SELECT CORR(staffnumber, startyear) FROM AssociationofPublicandLandgrantUniversities;

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: How many Association of Indian Universities have a president who started after 2010?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AssociationofIndianUniversities WHERE startyear > 2010;

sql: SELECT startyear, staffnumber FROM AssociationofMBAs WHERE location = 'Europe';

question: What is the combined number of staff in Association of Indian Universities located in urban areas?

question: Compare the average start year of universities in the Association of Arab Universities between Gulf countries and North African countries.
sql: SELECT location, AVG(startyear) FROM AssociationofArabUniversities WHERE location IN ('Kuwait', 'Bahrain', 'Qatar', 'Oman', 'Saudi Arabia', 'UAE', 'Yemen', 'Egypt', 'Libya', 'Tunisia', 'Algeria', 'Morocco') GROUP BY location;

answer: 1937 Nobel Prize in Physics for his discovery of electron diffraction in the famous Davisson–Germer experiment. Shared the Nobel Prize with George Paget Thomson.
1952 Nobel Prize for Physics for his independent discovery of nuclear magnetic resonance in liquids and in solids.

1988 Nobel Prize in Physics (shared with Leon M. Lederman and Jack Steinberger) for their development of the neutrino beam method and their demonstration of the doublet structure of the leptons through the discovery of the muon neutrino.
1990 Nobel Prize in Physics contributed to the development of the quark model in particle physics sits on the board of sponsors of the Bulletin of the Atomic Scientists
1996 Nobel Prize in Physics (shared with Robert C. Richardson and Douglas Osheroff for their discovery of superfluidity in helium-3)
1996 Nobel Prize in Physics for the discovery of the property of superfluidity in helium-3 atoms
2006 Shaw Prize in Astronomy 2011 Nobel Prize in Physics
Clauser–Horne–Shimony–Holt inequality Nobel Prize in Physics (2022) experiments with entangled photons violation of Bell inequalities pioneering quantum information science
Co-discovered the J/ψ meson in 1974 Nobel Prize for Physics in 1976

Co-inventor of the charge-coupled device (CCD) awarded a one-quarter share in the 2009 Nobel Prize in Physics for the invention of an imaging semiconductor circuit—the CCD sensor which has become an electronic eye in almost all areas of photography.
Developed the theoretical basis for laser science shared the 1981 Nobel Prize in Physics for work using lasers to determine atomic energy levels with great precision.
Discovered cosmic microwave background radiation (CMB) in 1964 won the 1978 Nobel Prize in Physics
Discovered the cosmic microwave background radiation Nobel Prize in Physics in 1978 (shared with Robert Woodrow Wilson)
Discovery of the positron in 1932 Discovery of the muon in 1936 Nobel Prize in Physics in 1936
Invented the integrated circuit Nobel Prize in Physics (2000)
Invented the point-contact transistor in December 1947 shared the 1956 Nobel Prize in Physics for their invention devoted much of his life to research on surface states.
Joint winner of the 1961 Nobel Prize in Physics Pioneering studies of electron scattering in atomic nuclei Discoveries concerning the structure of nucleons
Laser cooling of trapped ions use of ions for quantum-computing operations 2012 Nobel Prize in Physics
Leader of the Homestake experiment detecting neutrinos emitted from the Sun shared the 2002 award

Measuring the speed of light Michelson-Morley experiment Nobel Prize in Physics (1907) first American to win the Nobel Prize in a science founder and first head of the physics departments of Case School of Applied Science and the University of Chicago

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: What is the variance in the start year of universities in the Association of Arab Universities?
sql: SELECT VARIANCE(startyear) FROM AssociationofArabUniversities;

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: How many staff members are there in total across all Global Alliance in Management Education institutions?
sql: SELECT SUM(staffnumber) FROM GlobalAllianceinManagementEducation;

topic: Association of East Asian Research Universities
properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: How many universities in the Association of East Asian Research Universities have a female president?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AssociationofEastAsianResearchUniversities WHERE president LIKE '%female%';

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: How many staff are there in total across all Association of Pacific Rim Universities?
sql: SELECT SUM(staffnumber) FROM AssociationofPacificRimUniversities;

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: How many universities in the International Alliance of Research Universities were founded in the 20th century?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM InternationalAllianceofResearchUniversities WHERE startyear BETWEEN 1900 AND 1999;

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: Which Global Alliance in Management Education institution was founded first?
sql: SELECT name, MIN(startyear) FROM GlobalAllianceinManagementEducation;

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: Is there a correlation between the number of staff members and the university being located in a capital city?
sql: SELECT staffnumber, CASE WHEN location IN ('List of capital cities') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS IsCapital FROM EuropeanUniversityAssociation;

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: Which university has the highest number of staff in Universitas 21?
sql: SELECT name, MAX(staffnumber) AS max_staff FROM Universitas21;

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: What is the maximum number of staff in an association of MBAs?
sql: SELECT MAX(staffnumber) FROM AssociationofMBAs;

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: How many associations of MBAs were founded after 2010?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AssociationofMBAs WHERE startyear > 2010;

properties: name, nationality, gender, field of study, achievements
question: How does the field of study influence the achievements recognized by the Nobel Prize in Chemistry?
sql: SELECT fieldofstudy, achievements FROM NobelPrizeinChemistry;

question: How many Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business locations are there in each country?

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: Which university in the European Consortium of Innovative Universities has the highest number of staff?
sql: SELECT name FROM EuropeanConsortiumofInnovativeUniversities ORDER BY staffnumber DESC LIMIT 1;

question: Which International Association of Universities has the most recent start year?
sql: SELECT name FROM InternationalAssociationofUniversities ORDER BY startyear DESC LIMIT 1;

topic: Association of East Asian Research Universities

question: How many universities in the Association of East Asian Research Universities are located in China?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AssociationofEastAsianResearchUniversities WHERE location = 'China';

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: What is the relationship between the year of establishment and the number of universities established in that year within the Association of Atlantic Universities?
sql: SELECT startyear, COUNT(*) FROM AssociationofAtlanticUniversities GROUP BY startyear ORDER BY startyear;

question: How many universities in the European Consortium of Innovative Universities were founded before 1900?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EuropeanConsortiumofInnovativeUniversities WHERE startyear < 1900;

question: What is the variance in the number of staff members for Association of MBAs in the UK?
sql: SELECT VAR_SAMP(staffnumber) FROM AssociationofMBAs WHERE location = 'UK';

question: Which university in the ASEAN University Network was founded first?

question: How many universities in the ASEAN University Network were established before 1950?
sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ASEANUniversityNetwork WHERE startyear < 1950;

question: What percentage of Council of Independent Colleges members have a start year before 1950?
sql: SELECT (COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CouncilofIndependentColleges) * 100) AS percentage FROM CouncilofIndependentColleges WHERE startyear < 1950;

question: Is there a correlation between the start year and the number of staff in Association of Pacific Rim Universities?

question: Which Ivy League university has a younger president, Columbia or Dartmouth?

question: How many Association of Commonwealth Universities have started in each decade?
sql: SELECT FLOOR(startyear/10)*10 AS decade, COUNT(*) FROM AssociationofCommonwealthUniversities GROUP BY decade;

properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: How are the universities in the Association of Atlantic Universities distributed according to their presidents' first letter of their name?

question: How many International Association of Universities were established in the 20th century?

topic: Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business
properties: name, start year, president, location, staff number
question: How does the staff number in locations with presidents who served more than 5 years compare to those who served less in the Association to Advance Collegiate Schools of Business?
sql: WITH PresidentDuration AS (SELECT president, CASE WHEN (endyear-startyear) > 5 THEN 'More than 5 years' ELSE '5 years or less' END AS ServiceDuration FROM AssociationtoAdvanceCollegiateSchoolsofBusiness) SELECT ServiceDuration, AVG(staffnumber) AS AverageStaffNumber FROM PresidentDuration JOIN AssociationtoAdvanceCollegiateSchoolsofBusiness ON PresidentDuration.president = AssociationtoAdvanceCollegiateSchoolsofBusiness.president GROUP BY ServiceDuration;
